author: wn.com
title: Maldives implores the world to take urgent action against climate change (Ministry of Foreign Affairs ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Maldives ) 3 October 2015 , New York ; The Minister of Foreign Affairs echoed many leaders and her counterparts, in calling for urgent action to address climate change at the UN today.
